name: xchat log syntax
summary: a syntax file for xchat log files
description:
this is a syntax file for xchat log files so those that look at them alot
can read them easier than pure flat uncolored text

the syntax is setup just like what xchat outputs minus the colored nicks option
i hope to add that sometime but it could be a while if at all
install_details: to install just copy to your local syntax directory ~/.vim/syntax for most
